title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.

title: Shrimp and Grits
instructions: Cook the grits in chicken broth until creamy.
Sauté the shrimp with butter and garlic.
Cook the bacon until crispy and chop it.
Mix cheese into the grits and top with shrimp, bacon, and green onions.

title: Pound Cake
instructions: Cream butter and sugar together until light and fluffy.
Add eggs one at a time, mixing well.
Mix in vanilla extract, then alternately add flour and milk.
Pour batter into a greased pan and bake for 60-70 minutes.
